name: Shamanic Trip
description:
Shamanic Trip is a horizontal scrolling game that takes place in a beautiful cloudy and dreamy world, overcome obstacles by adapting your form.

Controls

  • Pause / Resume : [Escape] or [Enter]
  • Shapeshifting
    • Previous : [A], [Q], [Left arrow] or [Left click]
    • Next : [D], [E], [Right arrow] or [Right click]

Credits 

  • Arts : Lynx
  • Audio : NilsK
  • Dev :  Slymp
